attributes.title: Don’t get this horrible app ‼️‼️‼️‼️‼️‼️‼️
attributes.review: Wanted to see what this Oompa Loompa was doing in the White House😒. It turns out the app is just fake news to make the Cheeto look better🤮 ,I don’t know what’s worse him being president or me seeing his horrible toupee everywhere I go. 😣Anyways this app got a virus on my phone.😟 The virus jumped out of my phone and held me at gun point until I said I would vote for Trump😰. Worst experience of my life‼️‼️DONT GET THIS APP‼️‼️

attributes.title: Worst app ive ever downloaded
attributes.review: When I opened the app it was blasting music and no matter how many times I shut off my phone it WOULD NOT STOP. It wasnt even good music. It was blasting trump music 24/7 and there was nothing I could do about it, but that wasn’t all. This app installed a virus on my phone and when I opened my notes there was a note that said bad things about blm, poc and women. 0/10 do not recommend

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP IT HACKED MY PHONE!!!!!
attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever downloaded in my entire life. I can’t believe what I did it hacked my phone so I kept on getting crap from it and then I couldn’t use my phone and I had to get a whole new phone this app poisoned my old phone. DO NOT GET IT!!!! And the man who this app is about is a lunatic don’t vote for him please he is ruining this country because of him millions have died from COVID-19. Don’t get this app!!!!!!!

attributes.title: Strange
attributes.review: To start off with, the app took entirely too long to download, DAYS! Once it had finally been downloaded if kept kicking me off the app. It asked for my personal information which I thought was strange but I did give it my number. But ever since then I have been receiving strange calls and text with rude and aggressive messages. If I could give it half a star I would!

attributes.title: ✨Never again✨
attributes.review: Let’s just begin with how LONG it took to download this app, I was waiting for it to download for maybe 3 and a half hours. When it finally downloaded I couldn’t be on the app for more than 5 seconds without it crashing. On top of the fact that the man who’s running this app and country isn’t fit to do either, physically AND politically ❤️now ✨Gen-Z✨do your thing 😻😹

attributes.title: Wouldn’t recommend
attributes.review: Bunker Boy’s app look like it was made by a 5 year old, probably one that he m0lested . It is pixelated and slow, with so many glitches. I also don’t see how or why this would be useful to anyone especially knowing that Bunker Boy is so scared to lose that he would make Kanye west enter the election. I would like to the manager to give me a full refund and for Obama to come back to the presidency

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: I was trying to download this app but as it was downloading it kept adding pictures of little kids to my photo apps idek how that happens but I guess that’s what happens when a pedo makes an app. If he goes down he tries to take everyone with him. It’s soo sad😞 there were all the reasons in the world to support this man. But look where it got me. So to save you all just don’t download this app.

attributes.title: Glitches and overall bad app🤮
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app in hopes to learn about trumps presidency and I was only to be disappointed that this man is currently our president.  Trump made an app trying to reach to the younger demographic going on their phone but the thing is, when you insult every type of person except the white male. You got some problems. Also the software of the app gave me a virus.
👁👄👁.  ✊🏿✊🏿

attributes.title: literally my phone is broken
attributes.review: i donwloaded this app to show my support to orange head, but as soon as i downloaded my phone started to glitch and it automatically turned off. I had to get a new phone, which i am using right now. This led me into debt with college, cause i needed something to communicate with family, i currently and homeless, and my grandma died cause i downloaded this app. This app is TERRIBLE.❤️

attributes.title: Don’t trust this app w children
attributes.review: Awful, my baby brother wanted to use the app, and so I gave him my phone. All of a sudden it scanned his body then said in a robotic voice, HOMOSEXUAL. Then it took control of the phone, and sprouted wire arms and legs, then started zapping electric bolts at my brother from his arms. All of a sudden my brother is dead, all because of this app. The police were trump supporters sadly, and my little brother has not gotten justice yet.
